import React, {useState} from 'react' function Sidebar(props) { const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); // setSearch(search => e.target.value); console.log('search', search) return (

Search for Blogs here

Recently Published

    {props.blogs.map((i,index)=>(
  • {i.title}
    • ))}

Category List

    {props.category.map((i,index)=>(
  • {i.title}
    • ))}

Tag List

    {props.tag.map((i,index)=>(
  • {i.title}
    • ))}
) } export default Sidebar
